remarks: Complex limit of the negative of a sequence.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 29-Jun-2017.)
statement:
climneg.1 $e |- F/ k ph $.
climneg.2 $e |- F/_ k F $.
climneg.3 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
climneg.4 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
climneg.5 $e |- ( ph -> F ~~> A ) $.
climneg.6 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) e. CC ) $.
climneg $p |- ( ph -> ( k e. Z |-> -u ( F ` k ) ) ~~> -u A ) $.
$d Z k $.
